messages.message: Expected security scheme "sec2" from ois.[0].apiSpecifications.components.securitySchemes.sec2 to be present in ois.[0].apiSpecifications.security
ois.[0].apiSpecifications.components.securitySchemes.sec4 must contain "name" since value of "type" is "apiKey"
Security scheme sec2 from ois.[0].apiSpecifications.components.securitySchemes.sec2 must be present in ois.environment.securitySchemes
OIS "myOisTitle" must contain security scheme "sec3", as it is specified in environment.securitySchemes.[1]
OIS "anotherOis" must contain security scheme "sec1", as it is specified in environment.securitySchemes.[2]
